comments:
Release of AJ for JBuilder Plugin: 1.1b2 released on Wednesday Dec 18, 2002.
Found no newer Version for JBuilder.
-------------------------------------------------
I renamed a file in jbuilder 9 Enterprise from demo.lst to HelloWorld.lst
After that no compilation/switch to aj was possible anymore.
Renaming back brought no effort.

Exception follows:
-------------------------------------------------

Thanks for your help!
Was caused by a wrong lst file. Maybe an error message should appear.

The upcoming 1.1.1 release resolves this issue with JBuilder 9, and provide a 
better error message when the problem occurs.
